channel.title: gnu on emacsist
channel.description: Recent content in gnu on emacsist

item.title: Mac下安装GNU工具集
item.description: 安装 Homebrew ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" 修改 .bashrc 或者 .zshrc 添加以下内容 export PATH="$(brew --prefix coreutils)/libexec/gnubin:/usr/local/bin:$PATH" 安装 GNU Core Command Line Tools brew install coreutils brew install binutils brew install diffutils brew install ed --default-names brew install findutils --with-default-names brew install gawk brew install gnu-indent --with-default-names brew install gnu-sed --with-default-names brew install gnu-tar --with-default-names brew install gnu-which --with-default-names brew install gnutls
